objective_summary: The main research objective of Kumar et al. (2019) is to explore the potential of converting methane-rich biogas into methanol and utilizing it in microbial fuel cells. The study employs a two-step strategy for methanol production using methanotrophs and investigates the conversion of methane-rich biogas into various bioproducts, such as single cell protein, bioplastics, biodiesel, and others.
title: Kumar et al. 2019
